titles.title: A resolution to amend S. Res. 458 of the 98th Congress

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/7/1993--Introduced. Amends S. Res. 458 of the 98th Congress to provide salary continuation for up to 60 days for staff members of Senate committees or subcommittees whose service is terminated solely and directly as a result of a change of the individual occupying the position of Chairman or Ranking Minority Member.
